property.caption: Options JSON
property.description: Options to be selected in the dropdown in the format [{"value": "string","label": "string","children": [{"value": "string","label": "string"}]}] for 2 layers. Multiple layers of children can be added. Options can be set to disabled or default by adding a disabled/default boolean to the json. See documentation for more information.

property.caption: Can search
property.description: Whether or not the user can enter text to search the available options

property.caption: On Change Action
property.description: Action to trigger when an option is selected.

property.caption: Allow Select Parents
property.description: Whether or not the user can select a 'parent' option

property.caption: Expand On Hover
property.description: If set to true, the user can hover over a 'parent' to unfold the option. Otherwise the user has to click.

property.caption: Only Show Label
property.description: If set to true, only the value of the selection option is chosen. Otherwise the complete tree is shown.

property.caption: Placeholder
property.description: If left empty, the placeholder will be Please select

property.caption: Full response
property.description: Whether the response shows the complete 'tree' or only the selected option. If set to true, the complete 'tree' is returned is JSON format ["Value"].
